36 
38 //
39 // Class to specify an interval constraint on a scalar control variable.
40 //
42 
43 #ifndef FASTRACK_CONTROL_SCALAR_BOUND_INTERVAL_H
44 #define FASTRACK_CONTROL_SCALAR_BOUND_INTERVAL_H
45 
46 #include <fastrack/control/control_bound.h>
47 
48 namespace fastrack {
49 namespace control {
50 
51 class ScalarBoundInterval : public ControlBound<double> {
52 public:
53  ~ScalarBoundInterval() {}
54  explicit ScalarBoundInterval(double min, double max)
55  : ControlBound(), min_(min), max_(max) {}
56 
57  // Derived classes must be able to check whether a query is inside the bound.
58  inline bool Contains(const double &query) const {
59  return min_ <= query && query <= max_;
60  }
61 
62  // Derived classes must be able to compute the projection of a vector
63  // (represented as the templated type) onto the surface of the bound.
64  // NOTE: We will treat this vector as emanating from the natural origin
65  // of the bound so that it constitutes a meaningful direction with respect
66  // to that origin.
67  inline double ProjectToSurface(const double &query) const {
68  return (query >= 0.0) ? max_ : min_;
69  }
70 
71 private:
72  // Min and max interval values.
73  const double min_, max_;
74 }; //\class ControlBound
75 
76 } // namespace control
77 } // namespace fastrack
78 
79 #endif
